org.apache.lucene.index

Class PKIndexSplitter

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Split an index based on a Query.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PKIndexSplitter

        public PKIndexSplitter(Directory input,
                       Directory dir1,
                       Directory dir2,
                       Query docsInFirstIndex)
        Split an index based on a Query. All documents that match the query are sent to dir1, remaining ones to dir2.

      • PKIndexSplitter

        public PKIndexSplitter(Directory input,
                       Directory dir1,
                       Directory dir2,

                       IndexWriterConfig config2)

      • PKIndexSplitter

        public PKIndexSplitter(Directory input,
                       Directory dir1,
                       Directory dir2,
                       Term midTerm)
        Split an index based on a given primary key term and a 'middle' term. If the middle term is present, it's sent to dir2.
